fields.name: taskDescription
fields.label: Task description for this board
fields.description: Describe the task for this specific idea board.

fields.name: usePreviousBoardContents
fields.label: Use previous idea board's contents
fields.description: If enabled, when the user first accesses this idea board, the contents of the previous idea board will be copied to this one. Also, the user can copy the contents of the previous board manually.

fields.name: requiresCompletionToProgress
fields.label: User must complete this board to progress
fields.description: If enabled, the user must complete this idea board before they can access the next one.

fields.name: completionRules
fields.label: Completion rules
fields.description: Define the rules for when this idea board is considered completed.

fields.name: numberTextFieldsCreated
fields.label: Number of text fields created
fields.description: Set the minimum number of text fields that must be created by the user to consider this idea board completed.

fields.name: numberTextFieldsEdited
fields.label: Number of text fields edited
fields.description: Set the minimum number of text fields that must be edited by the user to consider this idea board completed.

fields.name: scoreForCompletion
fields.label: Score for completion
fields.description: Set the score that will be awarded to the user when they complete this idea board. If no rules are set for completion, the score is awarded when accessing the board.

name: addSummaryScreen
label: Add summary screen
description: If enabled, a summary screen will be added at the end of the exercise.

fields.name: previousContentDisabled
fields.label: Previous content disabled
fields.default: Going to previous content is currently not possible.

fields.name: nextContentDisabled
fields.label: Next content disabled
fields.default: Going to next content is currently not possible.

fields.name: clonePreviousSlide
fields.label: Clone previous slide
fields.default: Clone contents of previous slide to current slide.

fields.name: clonePreviousSlideDisabled
fields.label: Clone previous slide disabled
fields.default: Cloning contents of previous slide is currently not possible.

fields.name: fullScreenDisabled
fields.label: Fullscreen disabled
fields.default: Going to fullscreen is currently not possible.

fields.name: movedTo
fields.label: Moved to page
fields.description: @current and @total are placeholders and will be replaced by the respective values.

fields.name: currentPage
fields.label: Current page
fields.description: @current and @total are placeholders and will be replaced by the respective values.
